value.Description: Event value (vary based on the task)

Levels.late_hit: late correct response from previous trial
Levels.false_alarm: response not a hit or a late correct response

Levels.congruent: large and small letters are congruent
Levels.incongruent: large and small letters are incongruent

response_time.Description: Latency of button press after stimulus

response_out_of_range.Description: Reaction time flag for out of range responses

Levels.no: reaction time is in the correct time range
Levels.yes: reaction time is out of range

largeletter.Description: Large letter for the LG task

smallletter.Description: Small letter for the LG task
